questions.quote: Okay, thank you. Listen Jake, uh, where did you get those eyeglass frames?
No, but I've read articles and I must say it, doesn't sound very pleasant.
What the hell is this? "George, Elaine and I went to see Chunnel ... with Jerry." With Jerry, huh? With Jerry! Great. Great!  Probably went to the 84th St. That's where I always go with Jerry.
Oh, yeah, yeah.  Well, you guys just watch the tape and, uh, I'll get you some food.
Well it was worth it.  I'll be  right  back . Where are you going?
Today. I'm going today. Just don't do anything until you hear from me.
K-uger, that sounds like one of those old-time car horns, huh? K-uger! K-uger!
Hey, what are you doing tomorrow? You want to come see me on the Charles Grodin show?
